description: This PHP script handles AJAX requests to retrieve MoCA network diagnostics data, including mesh table entries, associated devices, and modem information, then outputs the data as a JSON response.

methods.name: getStr
methods.description: Fetches a string value from a specific configuration or data model path.

methods.name: getParaValues
methods.description: Retrieves parameter values for a given object name, parameter array, and mapping array.
